bibl.title: Latin Ostraca from Vandal North Africa.
Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P.Gascou)

bibl.note: P. Gascou 1-15 were discovered in Algeria near Tebessa at the end of the 19th century and acquired by the Louvre in 1910 while the precise provenance of P. Gascou 16 in unknown. P. Gascou 17 was found in Tunisia. - 1. O. Louvre Inv. MNC 1927 = O. Gascou 1 [= I.L.Alg. I, 3719 = C.I.L. VIII, 22646, 20 = A.E. 1900, 5]. Receipt. Henchir el-Maïz, 508/509. - 2. Inv. MNC 1928 = O. Gascou 2. Receipt. Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 3. Inv. MNC 1929 = O. Gascou 3. List of names (?). Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 4. Inv. MNC 1930 = O. Gascou 4. Receipt. Henchir el-Maïz, 496-523. - 5. Inv. MNC 1931 = O. Gascou 5. Latin document of unknown type. Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 6. Inv. MNC 1932 = O. Gascou 6. Latin document of unknown type. Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th /first half of the 6th c. - 7. Inv. MNC 1933 = O. Gascou 7. Receipt of payments (?). Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 8. Inv. MNC 1934 = O. Gascou 8. Document with partial regnal formula. Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 9. Inv. MND 891.A/1 = O. Gascou 9. Receipt for agraria. Henchir el-Abiod, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 10. Inv. MND 891.F = O. Gascou 10. Receipt for agraria. Henchir el-Abiod, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 11. Inv. MND 891.C/3 = O. Gascou 11. Register. Henchir el-Abiod, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 12. Inv. MND 891.CDE / 891.4 = O. Gascou 12. Register of livestock and barley. Henchir el-Abiod, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 13. Inv. MND 891.B = O. Gascou 13. Account of money payments. Henchir el-Abiod, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 14. Inv. MND 891.G/6 = O. Gascou 14. Account of money payments. Henchir Touta, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 15. Inv. MND 892 = O. Gascou 15. Inscribed vessel. Tebessa, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 16. O. Louvre sans No. d'Inv. = O. Gascou 16. Ostracon incised with Greek. Provenance unknown, 3rd-5th c. (?). - 17. O. Sbeitla Inv. D 2 = O. Gascou 17. Receipt. Sbeitla, 526/527 (?). - Avec résumé en anglais.

Gascou 7; 1934 = O. Gascou 8; MND 891.A/1 = O. Gascou 9; 891.B = O. Gascou 13; 891.C/3 = O. Gascou 11; 891.CDE / 891.4 = O. Gascou 12; 891.F = O. Gascou 10; 891.G/6 = O. Gascou 14; 892 = O. Gascou 15 O. Sbeitla Inv. D 2 = O. Gascou 17 145.5 O. Louvre Inv. MNC 1927 = O. Gascou 1
Rodney Ast, Latin Ostraca from Vandal North Africa.
Jean-Luc Fournet & Arietta Papaconstantinou (edd.), Mélanges Jean Gascou. Textes et études papyrologiques (P. Gascou) = TravMém 20 (2016) 1, pp. 7-32, 17 figg.; - 655.

P. Gascou 1-15 were discovered in Algeria near Tebessa at the end of the 19th century and acquired by the Louvre in 1910 while the precise provenance of P. Gascou 16 in unknown. P. Gascou 17 was found in Tunisia. - 1. O. Louvre Inv. MNC 1927 = O. Gascou 1 [= I.L.Alg. I, 3719 = C.I.L. VIII, 22646, 20 = A.E. 1900, 5]. Receipt. Henchir el-Maïz, 508/509. - 2. Inv. MNC 1928 = O. Gascou 2. Receipt. Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 3. Inv. MNC 1929 = O. Gascou 3. List of names (?). Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 4. Inv. MNC 1930 = O. Gascou 4. Receipt. Henchir el-Maïz, 496-523. - 5. Inv. MNC 1931 = O. Gascou 5. Latin document of unknown type. Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 6. Inv. MNC 1932 = O. Gascou 6. Latin document of unknown type. Henchir el-Maïz, late 5th /first half of the 6th c. - 7. Inv. MNC 1933 = O. Gascou 7. Receipt of payments (?). Gascou 12. Register of livestock and barley. Henchir el-Abiod, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 13. Inv. MND 891.B = O. Gascou 13. Account of money payments. Henchir el-Abiod, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 14. Inv. MND 891.G/6 = O. Gascou 14. Account of money payments. Henchir Touta, late 5th / first half of the 6th c. - 15. Inv. MND 892 = O.
